text: Wichita Falls is a city in Wichita Couty, Texas, United States. The population of Wichita Falls was 102,316 in 2020. The mayors of Wichita Falls are Glenn Barham, Linda Ammons, Michael Smith, Dorothy Roberts Burns, Rick Hatcher, Tim Ingle and Mary Ward. Wichita Falls was founded on Sept. 27, 1872 when the Choctaw Indians settled the area in the early 18th century and then white settlers arrived in the 1860s to form cattle ranches. == References == ==Other websites== *Official city of Wichita Falls website Category:Cities in Texas Category:County seats in Texas Category:1872 establishments in the United States Category:1870s establishments in Texas
title: Wichita Falls, Texas
